description: Starts the workflow when Calendly events occur

options.name: API Key or Personal Access Token

properties.name: scope
properties.description: Triggers the webhook for all subscribed events within the organization

options.name: Organization
options.description: Triggers the webhook for all subscribed events within the organization

options.name: User
options.description: Triggers the webhook for subscribed events that belong to the current user

properties.name: events
properties.description: Receive notifications when a new Calendly event is created

options.name: Event Created
options.description: Receive notifications when a new Calendly event is created

options.name: Event Canceled
options.description: Receive notifications when a Calendly event is canceled
